rooms.description: Entrance with reception area and built-in storage. Follows Vastu by aligning entrance to the east.
Bohemian-themed living room with natural textures, comfortable seating, ambient lighting. Vastu-friendly layout encouraging social interaction.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring a large Bohemian style table and decorative elements.
Modern kitchen with an open-plan design that seamlessly connects to the dining area. Vastu-aligned for positive energy flow.
Additional seating and relaxation zone adjacent to living room, ensuring a spacious layout per Bohemian aesthetics.
Largest bedroom with an attached balcony for fresh air and privacy. Bohemian decor and Vastu alignment (north-east direction) ensuring health benefits.
Bohemian-themed bedroom with a balcony, designed for relaxation and meditation. Adheres to Vastu guidelines ensuring calm energy.

Dedicated home office featuring a bohemian interior design with natural light and ergonomic setup. Positioned in the north area per Vastu for productivity.
Spacious rooftop terrace with panoramic views and Bohemian decor. Provides an open space for relaxation and social gatherings.
